pageSetting.title: 客户年龄结构分析

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc, sum(case when fx.nlqj='1' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl1, sum(case when fx.nlqj='2' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl2, sum(case when fx.nlqj='3' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl3, sum(case when fx.nlqj='4' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl4, sum(case when fx.nlqj='5' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl5, sum(case when fx.nlqj='6' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl6, sum(case when fx.nlqj='7' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl7, sum(case when fx.nlqj='8' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl8, sum(fx.khs) hjrq from KHFX_LSKHNJJGTJ fx inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=fx.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq=cast((cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01') as integer) and sjw.ym=fx.tjrq inner join TABLE(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX(fx.tjrq,$login_khdxdh$, 0)) QX on qx.khdxdh = fx.jgkhdxdh where jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) group by fx.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc, sum(case when fx.nlqj='1' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl1, sum(case when fx.nlqj='2' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl2, sum(case when fx.nlqj='3' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl3, sum(case when fx.nlqj='4' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl4, sum(case when fx.nlqj='5' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl5, sum(case when fx.nlqj='6' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl6, sum(case when fx.nlqj='7' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl7, sum(case when fx.nlqj='8' then fx.khs else 0 end) nl8, sum(fx.khs) hjrq from KHFX_LSKHNJJGTJ fx inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=fx.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq=cast((cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01') as integer) and sjw.ym=fx.tjrq inner join TABLE(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX(fx.tjrq,$login_khdxdh$, 0)) QX on qx.khdxdh = fx.jgkhdxdh where jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) group by fx.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc ) t
